text: Cláudio Brito (born 5 April 1965) is a retired handball player from Brazil. Cláudio competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics. He was born on 5 April 1965.Cláudio Brito == References == == Other websites == * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:People from Paraíba Category:Handball players at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic handball players for Brazil
title: Cláudio Brito
